about_the_game:
Isekai: Reincarnation in a New World is an RPG game where the player takes on the role of an animal and must survive in a classic fantasy world while trying to find out what happened in their past.
Find food, prepare recipes, grow plants and raise cattle to survive and fight other creatures to evolve.
The game offers 4 initial animals, with the possibility of reincarnating in 8 different ways throughout your adventure!
